resources.string:
- Dark Green Circle: Very Good
 - Light Green Circle: Good
 - Yellow Circle: Bad
 - Red Circle: Very Bad
 
The total air quality level is the same one that the worst level of a single compound. That means that if, for example, every compound has a 'very good' level but one has a 'very bad' one the total air quality is 'very bad'.
 
If the level of a given compound is 'bad' that means that, according to the data provided by the city council, it is over the safe limits for health.
App designed and implemented by Alejandro Martínez Remis.\n\nData provided by the City Council of Gijón (Asturias, Spain).
